data: `minecraft:exhaustion_values` defines how much exhaustion each player action should take.

data.Name: attack
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when attacking.

data.Name: damage
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when taking damage.

data.Name: heal
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when healed through food regeneration.

data.Name: jump
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when jumping.

data.Name: mine
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when mining.

data.Name: sprint
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when sprinting.

data.Name: sprint_jump
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when sprint jumping.

data.Name: swim
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when swimming.

data.Name: walk
data.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when walking.
